plot: The first of a new Columbia Phantasy cartoon series, introducing Margie, who receives a charm bracelet from Scrappy. When she falls asleep, the various charms on the bracelet come to life. ...
title: The Charm Bracelet
plot_es: The first of a new Columbia Phantasy cartoon series, introducing Margie, who receives a charm bracelet from Scrappy. When she falls asleep, the various charms on the bracelet come to life. ...
